Publications & Manuscripts

Yipu Song, Haonan Xiong, Wentao Jiang, Hongyi Zhang, Xiao Xue, Cheng Ma, Yulin Ma, Luyan Sun, Haiyan Wang, and Luming Duan. Coulomb Oscillations in a Gate-Controlled Few-Layer Graphene Quantum Dot. Nano Lett.(2016) DOI: 10.1021/acs.nanolett.6b02522.

Research & Experience

Research Assistant, Advisor: Prof. Luming Duan

Quantum Device Lab, Tsinghua University, Beijing, China
2015.6 to Present

Project 1: Band Structure Simulation of Gated Multi-layer Graphene(MLG)

Established models by using COMSOL and calculated real-space band structure of BLG & TLG under gate with abitrary shape.

Implemented the calculations of graphene quamtum dots transport properties by using kwant in Python.

Identified criteria of formation of graphene quantum dots.

Calculated Fock-Darwin spectrum of gated BLG & TLG

Project 2: Fully Encapsulated Graphene Quantum Dots in hBN

Designed and refined a stage for micromanipulating exfoliated hBN.

Developed a recipe for deterministic transfer of hBN.

Participated in device fabrication based on nanofabrication technique.

Ongoing project: Coherent coupling of a superconducting qubit to an electron spin ensemble in diamond

Assist in design, simulation and fabrication of transmission line resonators.

Perform fabrication and characterization of transmon qubits.

Research Assistant, Advisor: Prof. Amir Safavi-Naeini

Laboratory for Integrated Nano-quantum Systems, Stanford University, California, US
2016.7 to 2016.9

Project 1: Phonon-phonon Conversion with Cavity Optomechanics

Wrote MATLAB class and GUI for instrument control and automatic experiment.

Updated experimental setup to suppress mode-drifting and optic fiber vibration.

Derived theoretic results for the conversion which agree well with simulations and experiments.

Project 2: Nonlinear EIT on photonic crystal cavity optomechanics

Set up noise up-conversion for driving mechanical mode.

Modern Physics Laboratory

Tsinghua University, Beijing, China
2015.11 to 2016.7

Project 1: Entangled Photon by Parametric Down Conversion

Realized polarization entanglement and CHSH inequality violation.

Proposed an in situ method to adjust BBO orientation for max entanglement.

Project 2: Scanning Tunneling Microscope

Explored tip fabrication and measurement parameters to achieve atomic resolution on graphite surface.

Examed vacuum system and wrote a user manual for the whole equipment.

International Center for Quantum Materials

Peking University, Beijing, China
2015.7

International Symposium and Summer School of Physics and Device Applications of Two-dimensional Materials

Familiarized and practised on fabrication and properties measurement of 2-D materials
